name: Myself Care
description:
Myself Care is a game what involves of the magnagment of your own internal system, using  Lite Tycoon & RTS  elements. Protect your body from diseases of the outside and remember always stay healthy to finally evolve yourself.

How to play

Utilize the mouse for all the movements on the screen.

Move the camera: let your Mouse on the edge off the active screen  and you can go to all directions.

Plant the Flowers: just select the plant from the HUD and put in a space of the map.

Have Fun and Stay Safe!
